Photo of International House of Food - Phoenix, AZ, United States. What my buddy got. Delicious waffle!
Photo of International House of Food - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Lets go!

Vhno0QJaFZ5b3yIpbUkGQg.text: Came here for a big late lunch to break a fast. They close early, at 6pm, so they're mostly a breakfast and lunch place. Really friendly and prompt service thanks to Brenda! She recommended fresh watermelon juice, which was delicious and refreshing on a hot summer Phoenix day. I had a few Mexican plates and the food was solid, but not spectacular. Portion size seemed normal. Nothing fancy decoration wise inside or outside (although they have family friendly movies playing on the TV) but you'll leave happy

Ngy9K6JHqGkKpYAxtdl2pQ.text: So glad we found this place! Great Mexican food AND great Chinese food! What a combo.   At breakfast today we ordered chorizo & eggs, French toast, and spicy Chinese chicken.  It was all bomb.   Staff is friendly and helpful. We kept looking at the other food coming from the kitchen and wanting to try everything.   Will definitely be back.

photos.caption: Photo of International House of Food - Phoenix, AZ, United States. They have awesome tacos too!

--7955vOboy-p8aTer5zdw.text: The International House of Food was pretty good! It is in a sketchier area & definitely had my mom on edge, but the inside is nice & clean. The host & waitress didn't seem that they loved being at work 100%. The food was overall tasty.

PLozlFx-1BAoyTW8hpvMjA.text: Brenda was a great server and took good care of us! The food is decent, I expect more but it was nice to stop by and try it out!

xsd9IrcpEgwtZ1NaOXfJHg.text: Yesi was wonderful- so helpful! Food was delicious.   Definitely a place I'd recommend  I highly recommend the green salsa! Wish there was a habanero salsa, but it's ok.   I give International house of foods a 5 out of 5!

O6DOpaHIQiTqdrHf0_BuJQ.text: This place have awesome service, however the food is lackluster, at least all the asian food we've ordered. The lad thai was extra salty, without the normal favor that pad thair have, the brocoli beef and fries rice was meh also. So , I guess don't order asian food here...

RBlJIfPdvkvOil_si9jrtA.text: Stopped by for a weekday lunch as it was walking distance from my hotel. Asian bowls were special of the day so I ordered the Fire Chicken Bowl with fried rice as an upgrade. Fire Chicken turned out to be crunchy fried chicken pieces with an orange sauce reminiscent of General Tso chicken. The fried rice had some carrot and egg in it but didn't seem like an improvement over plain rice. I would have liked some crunchy bits and use of a sushi rice personally.   Service was great as it wasn't busy and food fresh. Good value but definitely not a destination restaurant.

StPO6CmzK4o5dvrSHbFstg.text: Neighborhood a bit sketchy.  This why I give it 4 stars.  Surprisingly delicious food!  I came with my family after touring the State House because it was within walking distance.  It reminded us all of a IHOP, of course.  We all got something different, and every meal was really good! Service was great, as well, with the waitress being very attentive to keep our water and tea glasses filled. Thanks for rounding out a great day with a great lunch!

wj2baacfWw2tCHXqhwEyWA.text: Ooo ihof doin it right and they got $5 breakfast (from 6am to 9am only tho :\) but the food is amazing! Place is nice and clean and pretty darn big too! You could easily throw a birthday party here. The staff is pretty nice too! They did a good job and were friendly and professional! I'll definitely come back and bring my family.

YJ6Lh-FgeTNUt0Xh0YshNQ.text: I finally came back to International House of Food. I couldn't decide what to get so I got two meals :-D  The woman serving me was nice and attentive and refilled my coffee without me having to ask. This isn't a requirement for me, but I appreciated it.   The food was excellent. The two dishes I ordered were breakfast and non-breakfast, so I know that I can come back here anytime of day and enjoy my meal.

8s-FdqJEPORXmkRjB0fPTg.text: Mexican, Chinese and American? All in one place! How good can this place be? Well let me tell you, my wife had the taquitos dorados with tomatillo sauce(Excellent) my son had the sweet and sour chicken(Excellent) and I had a burger it was delicious. The service is great and the staff is friendly and amazing! Great job guys will return for the great food and service.

JmreHFj9EMczGpCiJQvgMA.text: I wasn't sure about this place at first.  The location is kind of shady but the building looked new and clean so I thought I would try it out.  Walking in it was very clean and there were a lot of tables.  No booths I could see just diner tables and chairs.  Not for hanging out.  My table was sticky which concerned me but the food was really good.  I had the chicken lo mein and my guest had a monster burger.   Both were good size and very tasty.  I would definitely eat here again.  The servers were very sweet and attentive.   The food was fairly priced, most items about ten dollars.  Great variety, daily specials and breakfast every day for five bucks!

7M2ysPTYochW2cBT179sNA.text: This place has variety. America, Mexican, & asian food. The place is very clean & ample. The service is very attentive to their customers. The food has good flavor, presentation, & the portions are very full filling. The prices are budget friendly.

C_te5dP5WcsZC6j0Nai1vQ.text: This is a very good place to eat been here two times now and it's so so awesome and great food I will keep coming back to eat here so I might be here tomorrow for tacos Tuesday yummmy just got done eating here again we got the tacos this time very delicious and yummy and Cruz is so very awesome too she gets her work done too

wc9-yJskIJSqLQzx3pMYLg.text: This was my first visit to IHOF. It was delicious! Homemade food and family atmosphere. The prices were fair and it was very clean. The staff was very attentive and inviting. I will definitely be back!

nvXnEZlV8BOlNXU8F8wTGQ.text: This place is good!  We're going on a roadtrip and decided to go on a tour of Chase field and yelped places around the stadium. It's about 1.5-2 miles from the stadium and it serves American, Chinese,  and Mexican food. Dafaq?!!  We had to check it out. Got there around 10:15. We ordered the watermelon water,  orange chicken,  and French toast combo.  Everything was really,  really tasty. The watermelon water was made fresh to order and it had just the right consistency and sweetness. The orange chicken was crispy, crunchy and juicy without being mushy and sickly sweet. The French toast was also perfect. For a total of $22, it was great deal for the amount of food and the taste.  The service was awesome too!  The lady (can't remember her name) was fast,  friendly,  and helpful.  Next time I'm in the area,  I'm definetely going back here!

rCPmZGfkZu5nL4LjGXcagw.text: I don't know where to start it's clean, great staff Dally was awesome, good food, great prices one of the best places I've ate in Phoenix we'll definitely be back again super awesome atmosphere worship all the time

ed6ntPLCRIDTxKAZJhwe4g.text: This place was reccomended to me by the hotel I was staying at, and I'm so glad I listened. The service was wonderful, and Cruz was amazingly friendly and attentive. She was nice enough to explain couple things on the menu that I had never had before, and I decided to order something that I had never heard of...and now can't remember how to spell. Huarachas maybe? Anyway, they were awesome, I ordered them with carne asada. The cakes were great, stuffed with beans, and topped with onions, cilantro and the salsa was flavorful and a little bit spicy. I would definitely come here again!

qIPA9GNTOVoR__BVGSYSQw.text: We followed the reviews here and was satisfied. Great breakfast food, and Jose was really friendly and helpful.

_KGm1lyW1rbnq1-zapNEmA.text: Service was top notch and the food hit the spot. The owner was very kind and clearly values her staff. Our server was fun and helpful. There are a ton of choices on the menu, so it's great if you are looking for variety. I had the enchiladas and thought they were great!

029rLHS-iftQ5nVmVudAzA.text: Friendly staff and speedy service! The food was delicious, we got the carne asada huaraches and chicken street tacos, both so good. Kids shared an order of carne asada fries with the jalapenos on the side, which they liked as well. Will definitely be coming back!

photos.caption: Photo of International House of Food - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Carne asada huaraches and 5 chicken street tacos

O24RLXkedCD11RgHm_cJOg.text: better late than never- many visits, first yelp.  I go here for three and ONLY THREE reasons. Nothing more. Nothing less.  1) I order the same thing every time because its a magical bowl of magic aka Chicken Fried Rice *chicken extra crispy. Its LITERALLY the best fried rice one can ever consume- i can tell by the utter satisfaction my belly feels when i eat the ungodly serving size they give you. Get a side of fried egg o/m to really feel the magic.  2) Watermelon Water- I'm not gonna get into it- if you're near 10th (ish) Ave and Van Buren, stop what you're doing and go get some. I don't care if you don't like watermelon, just go get some and give it to someone you know so they can tell you how magical it is. This is obviously a test of faith to you non-believers. Go forth and enjoy!  3) This thing people call "customer service". I thought it was a rumor until i went to the IHOF- see what i did there? Anyhoo, it was amazing. From the gal at the register, Janet, to the magicians hovering over the cooking flames in the very open kitchen, EVERYONE was super willing and flexible with my ridiculous diva-esque requests. Picky eater? who cares (this may not be accurate)!! They could probably tell you NO and have you walk out of there feeling like your shit don't stink. They have never made me feel silly or unwelcome.  Thanks IHOF- for keeping it real. Maybe ill eat something different one day- probably not though. stay classy.

photos.caption: Photo of International House of Food - Phoenix, AZ, United States

kzTqjKbUA2nVpIPLa0oHMQ.text: Working at downtown it can be challenging to find a good lunch place. IHOF I just that! Thanks to Michelle for her friendly service :)

EH95k9_k_gbO5Wz1c8TfHQ.text: Had a great early lunch here today.  The Chinese Hawaiian Chicken was so good.  I ordered the plate and took half of it home.  Looking forward to stopping in again when I visit the State Land Department for business.

T7nKik345M4fecyA80tiXg.text: Such a random place but the food and the staff are amazing. You can get breakfast of waffles, eggs, and sausage or you can order authentic Mexican food or delicious Chinese. It is definitely a hidden gem. Today I tried the orange chicken with the fried rice and a spring roll. The orange chicken was mild just the way I like it.  For dessert I tried the fried churros with whipped cream and vanilla ice cream. All I could say is OMG! It was AMAZING! The churros were hot and crunchy with a vanilla cream filling. Wish I could come back but I'm just visiting from Chicago. Just wanted to leave the restaurant and staff a well deserved, pleasant review.

kcaW2ChvInFilkTLJl-9vw.text: We stopped in for breakfast,  so glad we did. Cruz was a wonderful  waitress. We ordered tons of foid and everything  was delish. The main reason we stopped in was  my husband loves breakfast burritos that have hashbrowns as the potato.  We were not disappointed.

kiBZhftRu8KztEkJsjMXHA.text: Per usual, IHOF has made me a delicious plate of Kung Pao chicken extra crispy.  I have been eating here since it opened at the other location and they make delicious tacos, Chinese food and some of the best pancakes.  It's nice that they moved even closer to my work at a state building.  A great option ESP now that's in walking distance.

photos.caption: Photo of International House of Food - Phoenix, AZ, United States

VD_lmLlASbnBjLHsV1QZZA.text: This was my first time trying IHOF and I was absolutely blown away. First off, Jose was very nice and had excellent customer service he made great suggestions and never denied any of my request like adding a fried egg to my bacon cheeseburger. Jose suggested an Agua Fresca and I went with the strawberry flavor and I was surprised to see him making it hand made with a blender behind me. I was so impressed with the flavors of the food and beverage. I will definitely be back to support this local family owned food spot!

AHwx6ncdVyAgzqZNeB6Rmg.text: Great wholesome family place. The surrounding area might seem sketchy but it's a good place go to eat for all your cravings. Great atmosphere great staff great food.

OkJwSA9nxLLLFnu63oytfw.text: Ordered the chicken strips. They were tender and juicy. Service was quick and fast. Very friendly and helpful staff. My server Chris was awesome. I will definitely come again.

b8SDf-QSHL9F8YzNhgC6dg.text: This place is great, the selection on the menu is astronomical but, does not take away from the quality everything they serve is fresh and savory. I would definitely become a regular here and most likely never run out of new meal choices. I will be back with the family to keep discovering many more delicious entrees.

zdEfDXEuRTPX_4MXmgOtrQ.text: I have lived right down the street from this restaurant for almost a year. I was searching for breakfast spots on google and IHOF popped up. My boyfriend and I decided to come and try it out. We walked in and were immediately greeted by a friendly host who asked us how many and where we would like to sit. We came right around lunch time and it was pretty busy. Our server immediately greeted us with a friendly smile and promptly took our beverage orders. We placed our orders. I had the big breakfast with pancakes and my boyfriend had the Mexican street tacos. I must say I have never been to a restaurant that serves American, Mexican, and Chinese cuisine all out of one kitchen. Our food arrived 15 minutes later and was exceptional. We came back two days later and the results were the same!! A little unexpected for downtown Phoenix in terms service. As a person who is in hospitality myself I will highly recommend IHOF. Job well done and I can't wait to come back.

Cxzqd5p5-y0p4JMBAZd3dA.text: Today's chicken pad thai was a disappointment. Very salty and the chicken was dry and hard. Also there were no vegetables in it except for green onion.

JKcy1ISeOxl2Tn1X4-2dzQ.text: Perfect for when you girl says "I don't care" has a little bit of everything. Asian, American, Mexican, & breakfast food! When came with a huge group because I knew none of us would be able to decide what we were in the mood for. I was impressed with Juan our sever, as soon as we walk in I felt 100% taken care of very attentive he went above and beyond offered to let me barrow an outlet for my dead phone. I was impressed with the service mostly and how delicious the food was for such a vast plate of food to choose from. The fruit water is the best, I recommend anyone to try it at least once.

4_gnJEMQ0fDnANtsyksaFw.text: Nice friendly staff. Stopped by for breakfast at 1pm. Food was hot, good quality, good taste, fair price. Next visit we'll try the Asian menu.  Recently remodeled. Clean restrooms, clean dining area. Nice setting and environment.

Vc44LEifqbVuq0r1479nLg.text: Good Mexican food. Basic place, but good food. Not too many quick good paces in tbevarea of the state Capitol. Will be back

kedDdjtTI9b1eIbKKV16Rw.text: Love the food and variety at IHoF. The location is in a bit of a sketchy area but I have never had a problem. They moved to a new location with a huge seating area. The restaurant is simple but very clean. The food is reasonable and good. It's nothing fancy, but perfect for lunch or to take home for dinner. The Mexican selection is where they shine but their American "diner" items are good too. I have not tried their Asian offerings. Parking is in a partially fenced in lot. There are a number of transients in the area but I have never had any issues with any of them. They also do catering and have a private dining room.

Kb5TqiipV0hwX3qBUgGXsg.text: Great food and variety! Paty gave me and my family great service. The food was very well made and the drinks were fresh.

M9KOKZPuwG0g1XOpoQad6A.text: WhAt a menu and what a staff. The food is amazing here  !!  so steak omelette was stacked, if you are looking for high protein breakfast , that omelette is everything you need. The pancakes are made to perfection and their French toast so good . You will literally inhale their food . We will be back for lunch , dinner and then set it to repeat . Try this place out

photos.caption: Photo of International House of Food - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Yep that IHOF

I ordered  the Sweet & Sour Chicken...the sauce was yummy , the chicken was breaded to perfection, onions, peppers, pineapple was fresh and crisp. Overall a nice place at reasonable  prices. I recommend giving  it a try.

TF_HNJVsYWKvB5JYruu24g.text: Cruz and the rest of the staff are awesome and the best. Found this gem sometime last year and never looked back. Great food, staff, prices.... Trifecta!  BTW.... The pancakes are GREAT!

Z5IwLRSMxyLnniQKxPIcGw.text: Great food, very friendly service and a great variety!! Also the place is clean and prompt. I would Love to come back to try the lunch and dinner options (which were available a lunch time also!!)

GpGiO-CE6v_OqYvoUjoLYQ.text: A great place for lunch or dinner if you have a picky family, they have a little of everything. Had the Mongolian food it was good.

B95cAWQe0vRrIMIrTT3MEA.text: Location might deter you from going in but don't let the looks fool you, food is delicious, service is friendly and place is clean. I will definitely be back.

PoCAZEBhXAFRUPbo-uWK2A.text: It was clean but they did not have coffee ready when we came and only had the slow drip pots. The waiter was very awkward and not really very friendly. The eggs had an odd seasoning on them.

jBrUWXmgi-R_Bpl_3Z6ODA.text: Delicious authentic Mexican food with some interesting plates beyond what you typically see in the United States.

4zPMVZES8lHiDdVGKeFZKQ.text: Nice family place. We have a large family and everyone had something different. I had the Dan Dan noodles. It had just the right amount of kick. Noodles were cooked just right and cucumbers gave it a cool feeling.  We also had the street taco plate. Our son ate every morsel on the entire plate.  Our younger boys had orange chicken, it was crispy and delicious. The fried rice was good and filled with fresh vegetables.  My husband had breakfast for dinner. He had the French toast, scrambled eggs (with cheese), bacon that melted in his mouth and hash browns that were perfectly cooked. Crispy on the outside and hot and fluffy on the inside. He declared this place his new breakfast go-to!! The aquas frescas were delicious but we were so stuffed we couldn't finish them!  The wait staff was super friendly and attentive and the owner/manager Jose came and made sure we were happy with our meal. So nice!  Definitely worth a try!  They also do pick up and delivery.

BQM8sC-l1nxsZ99P0ZJz4g.text: The people were great, but the smelly homeless interlopers and the really bland, tasteless food kinda ruined it. Also, pretty overpriced for overly breaded, bad Chinese food

0x1NbmWWnqwLclh--KkGdA.text: I enjoyed the watermelon agua frescas, however I tried the Hawaiian fire chicken dish and it wasn't particularly my favorite. I'm not sure if it was something about the texture of the batter that they fried the chicken with or what, but I would probably try something else if I go back. Friendly staff and clean.

JK6QWK86CDw_1BXGl56jdw.text: OMGOMGOMGNOMNOMNOMNOM   1. Cruz is such a GREAT hostess!!!  So kind and helpful!!! 2. The FOOD!!!  So much choice!  I had Hawaiian Fire Chinese--friend had Huaraches -- JUST TO DIE FOR 3. So MUCH FOOD on our plates!!!

Photo of International House of Food - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Huaraches Carne Asada almost gone
Photo of International House of Food - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Hawaiian Fire w Fried Rice (after eating all I could!!!)

Hg9Sk30BjMirjh6Vi5qhJw.text: For a 35 min no let me comp you took 20 min to say we ran out of rice.. Im eating for two and Im extremely upset..  Will never eat lunch here again

photos.caption: Photo of International House of Food - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Yuck

kI3CNDMtlwrr8yLXm2on8A.text: Great little place, really good breakfast! Excellent service! Went there with coworkers while in Phoenix on business, and was really happy with it. Will come back again when we are in town again.

sqWhNItWUE6aUiDgz6o0xA.text: Went here for a friend's birthday and this place has an exceptional service. The food came up pretty quickly. The staff and our waiter, Jose were so hospitable and attentive. We will definitely come here again when we're in town.

mHee-26oAUt9ipKai96z4A.text: Surprisingly delightful. Cruz and sylvia were great! Food was delicious and quick. Carneasada fries, breakfast burrito and quesadilla. Next time were coming for Chinese

00pqionV0Yr1lBJoqN58lA.text: First time at IHOF, great customer service. Really enjoyed the food Bacon Chicken Sandwich! Ruby was an AWESOME waitress, highly recommended.

nqD-OITe4kYNSt0w3ZgWUw.text: First time coming to IHOF. Ruby was an exceptional waitress. One of the best bacon cheeseburgers I've had. Definitely love the fries!!

4pjsWOMtL7WwjvEWB1_etw.text: Interesting menu options. I had Mexican, wife and son had Asian food. We were all very satisfied. Decor is uninspiring, that's ok though. I'm sure we'll be back.

photos.caption: Photo of International House of Food - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Pastor Huaraches $8.99.

aMQZMr8IXSgP5ri4XGsvNQ.text: Good food, good service, reasonable prices and great variety. We were plenty surprised by this one. Looking forward to coming back Plus it's a local family owed business!!

eEb0yHhhyAqGtkk3a9RB9Q.text: My husband and I were in Phoenix for the weekend and wanted home made food, not franchised food. The meat lovers breakfast was delicious and plentiful, according to my husband. I had the huaraches, which is basically a flat, fried gordita covered in beans, asada, onions and cilantro--it was awesome! The pineapple water was fresh and scrumptious. The staff Juan and Sarah were so friendly and they definitely take pride in this place. Try it and be pleased.

gPlNNWUqRKnXarBFN3PXhQ.text: Very delicious food and very authentic with breakfast preparation. Been here several times and always have had a great breakfast. Always very courteous excellent service. Meat lovers combo with waffles is a must. Anytime I'm in the area for a meeting I stop in. Great food great prices!!! Elizabeth is a great delight and wonderful server. She always has great attitude and makes sure you feel at ease. A must try for breakfast.

dZqMt0zg_autvC9i_psb1Q.text: The food and service was great here. Got the steak omelette and the pineapple drink. Everything was brought out very quickly and I couldn't have gotten better service from the waitress Stephany. I definitely would recommend this place.

uJesD-gJT_cYOsRsp4T4Hg.text: Totally stumbled upon this place while looking for breakfast spots downtown and decided to give it a try!! Cruz was our server and greeted us right away, she was so sweet!!! Our food came out super fast and the service was phenomenal!!! I love the easy parking and I love supporting family run businesses! Definitely stop by if you're looking for a good meal with good service in a clean environment!!!!! Way to go!!!!!

RR5_qxFZdoOXxv02yZAQ0A.text: Had breakfast here for the first time. The food was really yummy and the service was excellent.  Everyone was super friendly. The location may look a little scary from the outside, but it was very clean and comfortable on the inside and showcased a beautiful mural from a local artist. I will definitely go there again.

FQd-LoBxMW1V-QvfpSXfgg.text: Great food and service.  This will become one of my standards in the Phoenix area.  Looking forward to sampling their entire menu.

ZJeIDS4po6ifVkMTFeNSbA.text: This is a very nice, clean place. My husband and I stopped by here late one Saturday morning. It's amazing what they offer. Can't really call them an IHOP or Denny's since they also serve a more authentic selection of Mexican food. Asked the waiter if everything on the menu is up for grabs at whatever time of the day, and his response was, "yes". Hooray!!! American, Chinese, Mexican. Breakfast items as well. Yummy! My husband had a meat and veggie loaded omelet and loved it. I had pancakes, poached eggs, fruit, and sausage. Pancakes left something to be desired. Tasted store bought but okay. Wish they could spice the pancakes up a bit with diff toppings or flavors. Friendly staff and good cheap food. Will def come again to check out their Chinese and Mexican dishes.

xUzVets8c2pMEHDde9IXpw.text: Juan and his phenomenal staff catered our wedding for 125 guests with amazing, delicious Mexican and Asian food! The food was hot when the buffet line opened and the flavors just as good as in the restaurant. The food was so reasonably priced (under $2000) and all our guests raved about how good it was. The owner Juan is the most kind and patient man. He was easy to stay in touch with  and helped along the way, even helping to calm this nervous bride :) He was NEVER pushy about selling us what we didn't need or didn't want. He made sure to support us in all our decisions and helped us make sure there was more than enough food for our guests to enjoy. His staff was even willing to help cut all our cake for the reception. They go above and beyond any other restaurant in regard to affordability, flavor, kindness, and professionalism. I encourage any bride who want DELICIOUS, affordable food to call Juan and the international house of food, they made our wedding so special!!! Thanks to Juan and all your wonderful staff!!!! We can't thank you enough!!!

FjPdrhYLXAmcA8SkwTQzcw.text: I downloaded the yelp app just so I could review this. I ordered delivery from them. First time ever. I ordered their burrito which cost over 7 dollars with added pico and extra cheese. First of all there was almost no cheese anyway. Second, the burrito was 4 inches long, at the most. I asked for no rice and they put it in anyway. When I called to inform them they said they were sure they didn't add any but if they did they would take the burrito back and bring me another. My fiance ordered their orange chicken and she got more carrots in it than chicken. Her iced tea tasted like water and they didn't bring any sugar. I suggest not ordering from them unless you like to gamble with your meals and hard earned money.

zddYtOgjrF3pW5Wsvgd4VQ.text: Come see Janet and Saray! Great food! Great service! Great portions! They are very welcoming and friendly, the food is very good and the fruit waters are very refreshing, made fresh to order.

XJskZmpGYCcd65NEua0QMg.text: I visited this restaurant based on ratings. The exterior is not like your typical restaurant, and is pretty small. Once inside, the I found it to be very family friendly and the servers and cooks are very kind. I was in the mood for Chinese, and ordered sweet and sour chicken with fried rice. Soo good! I cut the pieces of crispy chicken with one stroke with my fork. They were juicy and so fresh. The sauce is very good- and the rice was delicious. I will be coming here more often, and plan to bring kids- I can order Chinese for me and burgers for them! The only thing, is it closes by six- So plan to go before then.

iWEvn6c9W4m_wfT_7ArMdw.text: Excellent service. Very nice people. Loss of options (bordering on too many), but the Mexican food was great and the prices can't be beat.

oI5kfLtL7HgpxFszAa7TGg.text: Good food, great servce, very clean!  you can get everything - from mexican, to chinese, even philly cheese steak . . . they have a lot of variety on their menu.  I highly recommend!

Ad_0T_T2j731Dxz2N8pBpQ.text: What a wonderful restaurant! I think it's the best service I've received anywhere in Phoenix. Janet was our server and super friendly and helpful, and everyone else working was also so very nice. I really liked the International Appetizer, which included egg rolls, chicken tenders, onion rings and french fries. It was hard to decide what to eat since everything on the menu looked so good and there's such an assorted genre of food to choose from. I will definitely be back! And they deliver within 3 miles of the restaurant, so it's good for a night in too.

N84BFO9GUuHvYDSh6oInIg.text: We stopped in for a late lunch and were immediately greeted and seated. The food was delivered quickly and was quite tasteful. Janet was our server and was attentive and quite helpful. She did an awesome job and deserves many kudos. The chicken enchiladas were tasty and plentiful. Prices not too bad. Will definitely stop by again!

1BId20H5HgiysY1tGCOTAQ.text: Great breakfast, yummy natural fruit smoothies made with just fruit and water and great service with a smile! Will definitely be back!

T-3bjxSHvsNQylDt9w3CgQ.text: 7/10/15: My co-workers & I had a great lunch here. This wasn't our first time and it won't be our last. The staff is very friendly and the food is excellent. The wait time isn't bad at all. It's nice to go somewhere, eat good food and still have plenty of time to chit chat before we head back to work. Highly recommended.

K-BeGPFoIJRp9To58xOmaA.text: This is a great quirky little restaurant. I usually stray away from places that have every kind of food under the sun, but this place is different. The food is always very fresh, hot and delicious. Everything is very clean. I get the feeling that the owners/management/staff really have their heart in it. Pretty quick too.

kv-qdhCe9fC6XYmK4EkZAw.text: Well priced, good breakfast. From the outside it looks run down but inside was very clean and nice. I felt very comfortable and food was good. I look forward to going back for lunch.
